(Simplified: 锒)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 良 indicates the sound; 釒 (metal) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 釒 [ jīn ] gold, metal; money
    • 良 [ liáng ] good, virtuous, respectable
①(鋃鐺)ａ．囚鎖犯人的鐵鏈，如“鋃鋃入獄”；b．形容金屬撞擊的聲音：c．笨重。
鋃鐺入獄 [ láng dāng rù yù ]: lit. to get shackled and thrown in jail (idiom); fig. to be put behind bars; to get jailed
鋃鐺 [ láng dāng ]: iron chains; shackles; (onom.) clank

“锒1”的繁体字。

鋃字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【金字部】　鋃； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1306第22
【唐韻】魯當切【集韻】【韻會】盧當切【正韻】魯堂切，?音郞。【說文】鋃鐺，鎖也。【前漢·五行志】作琅當。以鐵瑣琅當其頸也。【六書故】鋃鐺之爲物，連牽而重，故俗以困重不舉爲鋃鐺。　又【廣韻】一曰鐘聲。

[Su Ji 1] [Golden Word Department] 　锒; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 1306-22
[Tang Yun] Lu Dangqie [Ji Yun] [Yunhui] Lu Dangqie [Zheng Yun] Lu Tangqie,? Yin Yin. [Said the text] Clang, lock it. 【Former Han·Five Elements】Langdang. Take Tie Suolang as its neck. [Six Books] The slogan is a thing, and it is connected and heavy, so it is the custom to not lift the weight as the slogan.　[Guangyun] One said the bell sounded.
